channel.title: Our Super Cool Blog!
channel.description: We blog about everything we think is cool.
channel.author: Jeff Ammons

item.title: Our Cool Blog
item.description:
Welcome to Our Cool Blog!

We hope you enjoy it.
item.dc:creator: Jeff Ammons

item.title: Blog Post 04
item.description:
We found a new mountain stream. Surprisingly it looks exactly like the last stream we found.

I positively love this bit of water flowing downhill. Test

Top 5 Reasons I love streams

  1. Water flows downhill
  2. Water helps me not die
  3. Things float in water
  4. I like things that float
  5. I'm thirsty

I like bullet lists:

  • This is my bullet
  • This is another cool bullet

If I want to embed some code I can do This

var foo = 1 + 1;
item.dc:creator: Jeff Ammons

item.title: Our Second Blog Post
item.description:
Wow! We've posted twice!

How Cool Is That???

I KNOW! I can't believe we've made two posts either!
item.dc:creator: jeffa

item.title: Our Vacation Last Summer
item.description:
Wow! What a great vacation!

We had such a good time.
item.dc:creator: Jeff Ammons
